Reviews.Title: Excellent image quality
Reviews.Author: Kamel
Reviews.Content: I've got a lot to say about this TV, but I want to try and keep this rather brief so I will hit on the major points.First, 60hz is fine, not yet a 'good' reason to get 120hz (in my opinion).In my experience, the other LCD's I've seen do not come up to par with this one. In clarity, saturation, etc this one is in the top of image quality in my book. There are other wonderful TV's that are there too, so I'm not saying it's the best of the best. What I am saying though is it is very good, and among the best.The important options on this TV are all there. The ability to have 1:1 aspect ratio ("Just Scan") is very important for image quality IMHO. The real cinema is also excellent. The ability to quickly and easily change modes is excellent. The ability to change the labels of the inputs is a very nice touch. USB is nice as well, but doubt I'll get any use out of it. This is the kind of item that the more I own it the more I like it, where typically I find the opposite is true for many products I own. I also appreciate it a lot when I visit friends' homes that have different TV's. Before I didn't mind or even notice the quality difference. Now that I am so used to this TV, going to friends' homes makes me realize just how much of a difference there is from other TV's and these. A nice touch that's too often overlooked in this TV is the ability to adjust the power LED on the bottom to be turned off (as opposed to being red) when the TV is off. This is major if you want to have it in your bedroom so you don't have this red light blaring at you when you're trying to sleep.Also the power saving features are awesome. They provide a quick and easy way to adjust the heat/electricity used which is nice. Also, it gives you the option to turn off the display all together. This is excellent when using the TV just to listen to music or something. When in this mode, everything still works but the display is turned off. If you press any button it comes out, so it's not difficult to get the display back when it's been disabled.The simplink is nice, but doesn't seem to work perfectly. Sometimes it will change the input automatically to the appropriate device, and sometimes it will not. It does seem to reliably turn on when turning on a simplink connected and enabled device. It also has optical out, which is a major plus for me.Finally, I read that the viewing angle isn't great (especially vertically). I don't know if our sets are different or what, but I can say for sure my set does NOT have this issue. I get the full viewing angle, left to right and top to bottom out of this TV. At too much of an angle eventually the image will slightly darken, but usually it's at such an angle that I wouldn't even want to watch TV at that angle (talking <5 degrees angle). I wonder if maybe the reviewer had a different product, or if it has been improved since then in a minor revision (I'm reviewing the LG 42LD450)In my opinion, for the price, I couldn't have done better. I'm glad I did not go with the first choice I had because it was a bit cheaper.

Reviews.Title: A fine TV
Reviews.Author: Dahlia lady
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my LG 42LD450 . I made my purchase early this year (it was based on what I read here in the Amazon customer reviews). The price was right, delivery was fast and uneventful, and the TV was easy to set up and tune.I have never owned a TV with an LCD screen before and I was, and continue to be, very happy with the picture. I did not comparison shop by viewing other TVs locally before I made my purchase, but I can't imagine that there could be a better picture quality: the colors are clear and realistic, the face tones are good, the picture is crisp. And, to my surprise, the sound quality is very good for a TV ...much better than I was led to expect from some other reviewers (I did not feel that I had to rush to buy a  supplemental speaker set).Because I was so pleased by my purchase I ordered a second smaller LD450 for a bedroom. That says it all !Added 5/10/2011: I do not have trouble with black "colors"on my LG...anything black looks black, not grey. Perhaps this is because I have one of the preferred 450 models, or maybe it is because I set the colors to reflect a true black.

Reviews.Title: 42" LG LCD HDTV Review
Reviews.Author: B. Sedgwick
Reviews.Content: I love the picture of this TV. I never noticed how acne ridden some actors faces are. I'd heard that the 120 Hz TVs are so clear that the fake scenery in movies is noticeable so I opted for the 60 Hz. The motion trailers are noticeable but negligable. I still notice some fake scenery but the slight motion trailers actually keep me from noticing too much without distracting me from what I'm watching; It's still better than my old tube TV. The sound is good but some bass is missing so a sound system is necessary. This TV was made for DVDs and gaming.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied with LG 42LD450
Reviews.Author: Sentencer
Reviews.Content: This is the first LCD TV we have purchased, and we are extremely satisfied with this set. After studying and looking-up all the technical terms and what they all mean, we finally decided to get this TV. We even stood back from the electronics department in a few local retail stores looking for the best picture between all the sets, and to our surprise, twice we walked up to this LG TV.I do agree that after we pulled out the TV, all the pieces were a little confusing. However, the manual does an excellent job explaining how to mount the base together, and then the TV to the base. Setting up the TV was really simple and everything worked perfectly. Although this set only had 2x HDMI ports, it does however have composite video (red, blue, green), RCA (old yellow, white, red) and one coaxial connection in the back to connect your old devices. This was nice because we haven't switched to Blu-ray yet, so our old DVD player hooked up fine.I would HIGHLY recommend opening the menu and running the "picture wizard" as I was able to configure the coloring scheme just the way we like it. The pre-set color profiles are nice, but why not use a nice built-in tool within the menu to customize your viewing experience.I read that people had problems with the viewing angle, so I tested it out. I had no problems watching this TV from the side, and it also didn't have any glares on the screen either. If you're looking for a new LCD TV, then strongly consider this set. We have been extremely satisfied with this TV and  would recommend it to anyone in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jeepjoe4
Reviews.Content: love it games look great blue ray is sweet and is nice and bright in a well lit room with little to no glare.

Reviews.Title: I got NIce deal on thanksgiving
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I purchased this LCD on thanks giving day.It has good picture quality nice options.sound is ok but not great need to buy extra speaker for better sound.I recommend this item to buy.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Chief Fanatic
Reviews.Content: It's only 60 hz so you have to expect some blur on sports (football) or any fast moving movie (Matrix).  But overall for the price, it's a pretty good tv.  Picked mine up for $[...] bucks.  For a 42 inch, its a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent budget-mid range LCD
Reviews.Author: stevenz1g
Reviews.Content: I bought the set at Wal Mart, but I read more Amazon revies than anything so I thought I would leave one here.I previously had a 1080i Samsung monitor television and thought it looked great -- I was wrong. This completely blew my mind for the price it was, and I am completely satisfied with my purchase. It takes some adjustments in the color settings ( what LCD doesn't ), but once you get everything set up, the picture is crisp and clear with vibrant colors.The 24p feature is excellent. I decided to stay AWAY from 120hz because of the motion sickness it gives me. When playing blu-rays or DVD's, the 24p mode will automatically be enabled and there is virtually zero shudder/jarring/anything. I love it.Gaming on this is awesome as well. Almost zero to little input lag as compared to other sets.The amount of HDMI inputs is the only downfall to this set. There are only two -- and luckily I only have two HDMI devices.Awesome LCD -- do not hesitate to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For very reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: I bought it one month ago and I am very pleased to have it. good picture and good sound quality.I believe that this is Best TV in that price range.

Reviews.Title: Broke within a week
Reviews.Author: Alexander Lukashenko
Reviews.Content: Top right part of the screen (rectangle like) became discolored and the entire screen got grainy. Shows up even on the picture setup option built into the TV. Worked great till this happened. Of course it happened on Jan 31st (end of return policy) and now I have to deal with LG support (wish me luck) rather then have Amazon take it back. Unlucky enough to get a defective tv and unlucky enough to have it break on Jan 31st.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the Buck!
Reviews.Author: Shannon Dannettelle "TechJunkie"
Reviews.Content: No joke. I got this refurbed and it is a beautiful thing. I have this thing hooked up to my PS3 and it outshines my 42in plasma. I only wish it had a couple more HDMI ports. Not that I need them right now, but if I had my HD Cable Box, AppleTV and PS3 all hooked up to it, I would like them to all be connected via HDMI. That would allow one extra port for a laptop connection.As for now, it works beautifully and is 10x lighter than my plasma!

Reviews.Title: life IS good with a bigger tv
Reviews.Author: supertrooper
Reviews.Content: LOVE lg tvs, this one was the cheapest when amazon was having it's "big" tv sale. it was a lot less than the one that was 120 hz. i don't really know what the difference is between that one and this which is 60 hz, but the sound quality is great, picture is amazing, and my xbox looks great. only negative is that there are only two hdmi ports.... which makes it tough for xbox, bluray and cable, but if you're ok with a component connection you're fine. great tv for a small price...

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: grasshopper
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase. I waited a long time to buy a new TV and am very satisfied with my choice.

Reviews.Title: beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: lopham3
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV from the warehouse furbish site and save some money.  TV came promptly.  The TV was bigger than I had expected.  It was ok to put together.  I had to find my screw driver since the stand had some screws that came with it.  But that said, I did it by myself without any problem.  Picture is beautiful, crisp, clear.  Very satisfied.  Would give it 5 stars but putting TV and stand together was slightly more work than my previous Samsung LCD.  But this TV has the same picture quality with my samsung and is cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Backlight bleeding
Reviews.Author: mase
Reviews.Content: I liked this tv at first until i noticed the backlight bleeding in all four corners of the tv during dark scenes. I returned it!

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: bookaddict44 "debdivine"
Reviews.Content: I had been looking and researching TV's since before Thanksgiving.Finally I decided right after Christmas,this one had the price I wanted,and the size and features I wanted.What a GREAT tv!I would highly recommend it.Easy to use,great picture quality,great sound,and it looks awesome.We are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: LG 42LD450 42-Inch 1080p 60
Reviews.Author: Nancy E. Greek
Reviews.Content: I love this tv!!!  Very easy to change from watching tv, to doing the wii, to watching a dvd!!  Also love that it came so quickly!Thank you.

Reviews.Title: amazon is the best
Reviews.Author: charly
Reviews.Content: the tv is excelent, but amazon is amazing the tv came broken from the delivery and they sent me a new one in 2 days. this is the site I most trust to buy on the internet.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with this one
Reviews.Author: Ed Gowan
Reviews.Content: Opened the box 15 minutes after it arrived in perfect condition during the Christmas shipping rush. Placed it on the wall in our game room where we had previously had a different set.Plugged in the cable and power cord and turned it on. The set pretty much did everything else needed like locating source of signal and other connection like the CD, VCR, WI.  We are old timers and had no problems as some of the other reviews had stated they had. It was all good and we use it often. Fantastic picture, sound and a GREAT  deal for the money. I'd buy another if I had a wall or room for it.

Reviews.Title: Best Bargain
Reviews.Author: Dubwax
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice TV for the average viewer. It has a "cheapness" regarding the build quality of the stand/frame but the picture is very good for the price. Only 2 HDMI inputs might be a problem for some, but works for me. Looks incredible as a PC monitor. I compared many different televisions before finally deciding on this one, and so far I have had zero regrets. I got it from Amazon on Black Friday for $478 flat (no tax and free shipping)... unbeatable if you are on a budget.

Reviews.Title: LG 42 inch lcd
Reviews.Author: Bennett
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome, it's got tons of features and an amazing picture. It's definitely the best tv deal around right now. You will not find another 42 inch tv this good for under $500. Bought mine on amazon and it came with free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Rich
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after New Years after comntemplating on buying one for about 2 months. I wanted to find a TV that was reliable, had a good picture, and fit my size standards. I sit about 10 feet from this TV in the living, and before I bought this TV, I was hoping for a 46". However, after buying the 42" LG, I am more than happy with the size. It is much bigger than I had expected. The picture quality is great in my opinion. The sound is great as well. There aren't many features but what do you expect for a $500 TV. This is an amazing TV for the price and there isn't anything bad I can say about it. I watch TV through an antenna and sports are fine on 60 HZ. I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for an inexpensive starter TV with not many extraneous features but a great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Choice!!
Reviews.Author: Gary -Florida
Reviews.Content: After reading everything I could about this HDTV, I was positive this would be the best HDTV I could get for my daughter for Christmas. She did the set up on her own which is a miracle in it's self. After a few days she called and told me she just couldn't believe the picture quality. She wasn't that kind about the sound but she hooked it up to her theatre surround sound system so that wasn't an issue. Amazon.com made this an easy transaction. Shipping was lightning fast and actually the unit showed up a day before the estimated date of delivery. That too in its self is amazing, especially during the hectic Christmas shopping rush.I would highly recommend this TV!!

Reviews.Title: LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Carl Roberts
Reviews.Content: The TV is very easy to set up and use. The quality of the picture is great and we have been enjoying it since the day it was received.

Reviews.Title: LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Carl Roberts
Reviews.Content: The TV is very easy to set up and use. The quality of the picture is great and we have been enjoying it since the day it was received.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: 4Rosie
Reviews.Content: This is the most beautiful 42" LCD TV I have seen in a while.  Amazon ships super fast and I received it within 2 days.  Setting up was simple and the picture is awesome right out of the box. I couldn't ask for anything better! Very very pleased.

Reviews.Title: great picture, great price!
Reviews.Author: E. Holmes
Reviews.Content: It was a present for my in-laws, and we set it up on Christmas Day.  Everything is great except the speakers are in the back of the set.  With the speakers aiming back towards the wall is makes the sound a bit muffled.  All in all a pretty good deal for the price..

Reviews.Title: best TV for 500, I've got an W
Reviews.Author: dn "ca man"
Reviews.Content: after so many times looking at Walmart, Frys and Best Buy, I decided to buy this TV at Amazon for a low price.  The picture is so amazing, 5 STAR, for audio, I don't care, it can't be good when it come out from a tiny space like that...Before the TV came, I worried what if I get a D, because when I went and checked at Frys, W's picture and viewing angle completely blows out D versions (yes, I have to look at the back for model number, and it's not easy to find D and W at same store, finally I found one store so what I compared are 32 with D vs. 42 with W), and one thing suprised me, Walmart, they all have W.  MISSION COMPLETED>>

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: John A. Bailey
Reviews.Content: Even with a bit slower resolution (60 Hz), this TV was a wonderful first HDTV purchase for my home.  The picture quality and sound quality are very good, and for less than $500, I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for a very nice LCD Television
Reviews.Author: MN Steve
Reviews.Content: We purchased this LG television from Amazon on New Years Eve and it was delivered on January 6th without a problem. Unit was delivered by Federal Express in great shape, LG does a nice job with packaging their products. The price we paid was a shade under $500 with free shipping and no sales tax. In addition, I was able to get 24 month interest free financing which made this purchase a really sweet deal! After doing tons of research, reading countless reviews and seeing different brands/models (LCD and Plasma) in retail stores, I always came back to the LG 42LD450 and I'm glad I did. The 42" size was perfect for our living room, it looked great and the picture is superb for a 60HZ LCD television. The set was pretty good right out of the box, the features are more than adequate for our needs. Standard definition was okay with DirecTV, games and blue ray movies were excellent using our PS3. I have no complaints regarding the sound, I plan to connect to a home theater system very soon. Today we received our new DirecTV HD dish and receivers for our two HD television sets, what a difference that makes in the picture on this set (Full HD) and even on our 32" 720p Sony Bravia. The LG picture modes work great, we have mostly been watching in Cinema mode but I have been playing with the nice Picture Wizard feature to find that "perfect" image.I would recommend the LG 42LD450 as the one to purchase if you don't want to spend a lot, but want a set you can really enjoy. We are very happy with this purchase, you can't go wrong with this LG television. From what I can see, many people have purchased this LG television and like us, are loving it! BTW, this was a late Christmas present for the family, a BIG thanks to Santa!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV -- very pleased!
Reviews.Author: John Squillace
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 10 days now.  Setup was easy.  The picture is great.  My only complaints are that the speakers are underneath the screen so higher volume also projects behind it.  My daughter's bedroom is behind the wall behind the TV so if the volume is a little high, it disturbs her.  Forward facing speakers would direct the sound better.  Also, setting the sleep timer requires a few clicks on the remote control. There is not a dedicated button on the remote; you have pop into Quick-menu and arrow around to select sleep, then arrow down to the desired time.  Otherwise, I'm extremely pleased with this purchase.Shipping was great.  Delivered right to my door.

Reviews.Title: High quality for low price
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Stankiewicz "FJS"
Reviews.Content: This is a superb buy for the price! I paid $500 through Amazon and couldn't be much happier. Picture is excellent, plenty of connections on side and rear panels and the sound is pretty good for built in speakers on a flat screen. PS3 games and blue ray play are amazing at full 1080 resolution.-While it may not have ALL the bells and whistles available in today's market, it is very functional and a great pickup for anyone on a budget or for the frugal shopper!

Reviews.Title: Great TV Except HDMI is Intermittent
Reviews.Author: Shawn Coons
Reviews.Content: TV works great, good picture, easy setup, easy use.  The only problem is that when I plug my PS3 into the HDMI the TV doesn't usually detect it.  The PS3 has worked perfectly hooked up through HDMI to other TVs and monitors, but with this LG I have to turn the TV on and off 5-10 times before it will detect the HDMI signal.

Reviews.Title: More than I needed in a TV
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: This was my first purchase of a flat screen TV, and I am more than happy with it. I plugged it in and it worked. There was no complicated setup to go through, the picture is great, and the sound is better than I expected. This model doesn't have all the bells and whistles that some models have, but I just wanted it to watch TV and the occasional DVD.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Mike C
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a present and had zero problems with Amazon.  I checked the prices everywhere and this was the best deal.  Amazon even had a price watch and credited me with the difference in price (you just need to watch it yourself and put in the claim).  Delivery was fast and the box was in good condition.  This is the second TV that I've bought through Amazon.The TV itself has a great picture.  The stand is not the strongest and shakes when you change the angle.  Good deal for the price.  Not all the features of the pricer TVs, but worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased so far
Reviews.Author: dontomasino
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month now, and I've been very impressed with the picture quality.  Setup was very easy, and user interface is simple and easy to follow.  I haven't had any complaints about this TV yet.  I've also been surprised by the amount of HD programming I get just over the air, I didn't expect to get so many HD channels without paying for any cable or other services.  I'd recommend this TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Range Snodgrass
Reviews.Content: This TV arrived in a very short time after ordering. Packaging was great with no damage. TV has outstanding picture and sound quality. Only has 2 HDMI's which is not a problem for me. My wife hated our 32" we had due to sound and now can watch it with volume at 25-30 on 100 scale. Great!!!

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Good TV for the money but do not waste your time buying from Amazon.  They say it is new but it is a returned item.  Just buy the reconditioned one and save some $$.

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: NPB
Reviews.Content: I rarely write reviews for products, but I just had to for this TV.I was doing research for my first flatscreen television and kept coming across this LG. Long story short, I took the leap and purchased it without seeing it in person. I figured if it was terrible, I could return it. I have to say that my expectations were surpassed. Whether I'm watching a DVD or playing Xbox, the picture on this unit is simply perfect. The picture is crystal clear and vibrant and has transformed mu television and gaming experiences. My partner wasn't too excited about us getting a new television, but after a few nights of sitting in front of this thing, he was singing its praises. There are still some night where he'll blurt out in the middle of a movie, "This is so nice."The only thing I don't like is the fact that there is only one HDMI outlet, meaning you have to get a splitter if you want to get HD on more than one component, say an XBox and a cable unit. But I'm more than willing to overlook this for all the other benefits it offers. A few weeks after it arrived, I made a trip to an electronic store and couldn't find a unit to compared to this one. And the ones that came close were hundreds of dollars more and usually a size or two smaller. The icing on the cake is the price.Can't say enough good things about this TV. Get it, especially if you're a gamer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.  Bluray looks great too
Reviews.Author: D. Young
Reviews.Content: Beautiful TV.  The best value out there right now.  I was concerned that having only 60hz would ruin the bluray experience, but it doens't--the picture looks great.

Reviews.Title: LG 42 inch
Reviews.Author: jraz
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my purchase.  I hung it on the bedroom wall with the recommended chettah mounts and am pleased with the quality of the picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: fordman
Reviews.Content: I could`nt pass up this good deal. I bought this flat screen for my mother who is visually impaired.  The picture, sound, and all around quality of this unit is great. The last lcd I puchased only lasted a year and a half. I did not buy that unit from Amazon. So hopefully this one lasts longer than that one. Anyway for the money you can`t beat it. As I said so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for $550 in a after thanksgiving sale.  They refunded $50 when the price went down.  The TV has great picture and sound, and does a great job with non-HD pictures too.  Easy setup and works great.

Reviews.Title: LG HD TV-lcd flat panel
Reviews.Author: jaward
Reviews.Content: This TV replaced a 42 in. that I already had which was a Poleroid and I am totally satisfyed with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Best Price, at least 80 dollars cheaper than WalM and BestBuy
Reviews.Author: Chop710
Reviews.Content: Great TV. GF hooked it up and when I got home from work we watched Iron Man 2 on it. Looks Great. Used a Sony sound system instead of the TV's so I don't really know how it sounds. I went to Walmart and Best Buy to price check and they were both at least 80 dollars more expensive for the exact same TV.

Reviews.Title: only has digital optical out, not user friendly
Reviews.Author: Richard L Russell
Reviews.Content: pretty good tv but was unable to hook up my 4 year old home theatre system due to the TV only having a digial optical out and my HT system was not compatable.  you can buy a converter box, online only, but the one I bought didn't help.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Loeffert
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Easy to set up, looks great, easy to use, and the picture is fantastic!  I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Yep
Reviews.Author: Jimbo Slice
Reviews.Content: Great product for the money! Couldn't believe it was of such high quality for the price but it was great!!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Bilyk
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV.Pros- Quality- Size- Menu- Connections (2 HDMI, VGA, Component, 2 Composite)Cons- I have no idea if or how you can make Simplink work with Xbox 360- It's not as sturdy on the stand it comes with as I'd like.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Israel Castillo
Reviews.Content: I have bought this product on the last black friday for $478.00 and for the money I believe you can not get any better Full (1080p) HDTV. The picture is excellent and sound quality not bad at all. I use it mainly for watching movies and golf on weekends. The connectivity is also very good. Can't find any flaw or bad argument for this HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great price
Reviews.Author: deallover
Reviews.Content: bought this for my father and he absolutly loves it and says the picture is awesome.  one of the best deals i've found.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: The Giz
Reviews.Content: Love this TV!  It is my second LG HDTV and they both are beautiful. Great Picture and stylish looks!  Very easy to use and has a nice bright picture (we use it in the sunroom).  LG makes a great product!

Reviews.Title: My New TV
Reviews.Author: hlw2010
Reviews.Content: I was planning on buying a tv from walmart on black friday but, found this tv online (amazon) for the same price, no tax charge and no shipping. great deal. Love the tv.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: S. Mansoor
Reviews.Content: I have not had any major problems with this TV so far. I got a great deal for it which makes it a big plus. I previously had a 21 inch TV so I may not be the best person to say but sometimes the video does seem a little blurry to me. Other than that no issues at all. It was easy to install and is surprisingly light. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: my sewing-rooom's private movie theater
Reviews.Author: Mary kelz
Reviews.Content: I had a very small tv in my sewingroom (12 or 13 inch). I couldn't read anything written on the screen(and I wear glasses).  So my husband bought me my own 42-inch flat-screen tv. WOW! Now ,Dr. Phil's head is larger than mine. I own other LG products and I am very pleased with the tv. The picture is so clear.  The only other accessory you will have to buy is a HDMI cord to get the sharpest picture. I also like the price I paid-below even the electronic big boy stores. Because I am a Amazon Prime member (I would recommend this for anyone) I paid no shipping and got it in two days! The price I paid for the size and pixel I got was fantastic.  I coulldn't be happier.Mary K. St. Augustine, Florida

Reviews.Title: Super deal for the holidays
Reviews.Author: John E. Cary "tech buyer"
Reviews.Content: While on a long term project, I decided I wanted a medium size TV to keep me entertained during my evenings. I shopped and decided a 40-42 inch TV was best for my small studio apartment. I saw where Walmart would be putting one on sale during Black Friday and knew my chances of buying one from them would be slim. I shopped at Amazon and saw a better model for the same price. Someone has written a review with bad comments about angular viewing. I am happy to report - this TV is an excellent purchase and performs extremely well. When I bought a DVD player and attached it, the TV immediately detected it and asked if I want to begin using it. Sounds like a small item, but my much more expensive TV at home is harder to connect with. I am anxious to try the other features that this set has.

Reviews.Title: great gift for mom
Reviews.Author: B. Kelly "ninjakat99"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv as a gift for my mom for christmas.The tv shipped very fast and was delivered within two days on the exact day they said it would.  which is awesome.The tv itself is very light weight and easy to setup.  My mom does 't have a home theater system but even if she did it would be a no brainer.  The color is amazing, I was very impressed with the picture and sound quality for the price.  im not a tv expert but bang for buck this is nice.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Apt dwellers
Reviews.Author: J. Barnes "Florida Doris Fan"
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier, this tv fits perfect in my apartment, the picture is one of the best I've seen and the sound is great.  You can't go wrong with this especially if you live in an apartment or condo where a massive sound system is out of the question.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Melba M. Kinnin "love to read"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  It has great picture and video.  42" perfect for the master bedroom.Great product!

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Samul
Reviews.Content: Love the new TV It was a great deal the picture quality is very nice. The sound is not great but it's not our primary tv so it's okay. For a second tv, it fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: J.  Papa
Reviews.Content: I'd recommend this product without hesitation.  Best price with great high definition television on a big screen.  Can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for $500, and for that price it is a bargain. It has vivid colors, super-black blacks, and great sound. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV for the price
Reviews.Author: Morgan
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and for the price that I paid, I absolutely love it.  The only negatives are the sound quality, which is taken care of with my surround sound system.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Sarah Jane "S"
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for a month now, the picture quality is excellent! The sound quality is lacking but once I hooked up my surround sound its great. Great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Sarah Jane "S"
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for a month now, the picture quality is excellent! The sound quality is lacking but once I hooked up my surround sound its great. Great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: M. Cox "mmorningstar"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a flat screen HDTV for awhile, and this one seemed to have everything I wanted.  Amazon advertized it for the lowest price ever and I ordered it the weekend before Christmas.  It was delivered to my home in three days.  Easy to set up, it looks great and the picture is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, especially for the money
Reviews.Author: JMK "eyemon"
Reviews.Content: I have to agree with the majority of the reviews so far.  It is an excellent TV.  It has enough inputs to keep us satisfied.  We have it in a bedroom with a 14 ft viewing distance.  The picture is excellent, colors good, and no issues with fast moving action/sports.  I am a hockey fan and it is wonderful- without any noticeable issues that TV companies want to upgrade you to a 120Hz refresh rate.  For under $500 delivered, you can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Value Galore
Reviews.Author: Mike T.
Reviews.Content: I have the TV in use for about a month now and there are no problems whatsoever. There's a lot of hype out there about 120Mhz, internet, etc., but if you want a good quality TV with a real budget in mind, this is it.Some people would think it won't capture motion like a 120Mz TV, but it does. There are no problems with blur, sharpness, etc. While it doesn't have internet ready jacks (but it does have HDMI jacks), I really don't use that nor do I see myself using that.  I could always hook my PC to it if I needed to.Also, the remote and menu system is intuitive.  No need to review a set of instructions.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Oh, so happy
Reviews.Author: ageless13
Reviews.Content: I am so very happy with this Amazon purchase.  This is easy to operate ,picture is clear and bright and the sound is better than my smaller flat screen (now in the bedroom).  Delivery was fast and free -along with no tax - this TV is fantastic for the price without the store hassle and trying to squeeze in to a car.  Buy it - you will not be unhappy.

Reviews.Title: LG 42LD450 42-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Rae
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great Value.  There are not as many connections as higher end TV but I do not need them.  The LG picture is as bright a picture that is out and I am loving the purchase still a month later.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: G. Wright
Reviews.Content: A great TV with easy setup. The picture is bright, color accurate right out of the box. Input selection GUI is very good.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed!
Reviews.Author: Dave S
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a few days now and am extremely pleased.  The biggest concern I had going in was the 60hz refresh rate.  I have watched some sports including football this past weekend, but have not seen any motion blur.  The picture is outstanding. I am still tweaking some of the settings, but overall I am very impressed with the product.  I don't have it hooked up to an audio source yet, but the internal speakers are decent for casual viewing.So far so good!

Reviews.Title: Great "My First LCD TV" under $500
Reviews.Author: eman0051 "e_urbano123"
Reviews.Content: This is my first LCD TV and I got it for less than $500 the week of Black Friday (2010). I was very impressed when I played first video games on my PS3 connecting w/an HDMI cable! Blu-rays look amazing as well!The only thing I regret is that the refresh rate is 60ghz instead of 120 or more. It really does make a difference, but I didn't feel like it was worth paying an extra $200 for it. But you can only notice the image getting blurring if it's moving quickly across the screen. Reviews.Content: Recently purchased this TV after much research, visits to my local Walmart to view the TV in person, and comparison shopping. Walmart was going to have this as a Black Friday deal but Amazon of course lowered their price significantly as well and had the added bonus of free shipping.Set up was a breeze and I was able to get in and use the Picture Wizard function right away to optimize the picture for the room and lighting. Reviews.Author: jeremy
Reviews.Content: This TV works just as advertised.....That being said, I am in the process of returning this it.  For this size of TV, 60HZ, as it turns out is just too slow.  Watching any sort of HD video is painful.  The only way to describe the experience is by comparing the pan of a 1080p blue-ray on this TV to a flip-book; it's just unwatchable.  If you're watching only netflix or using the composite-in's than this TV may be watchable.  But then again that defeats the purpose of getting an HDTV in the first place.  I recommend thinking long and hard about what you expect from an HDTV, what you will actually be watching on it and THEN decide if you're willing to settle for 60Hz.  I made the mistake of thinking 60Hz wasn't a big deal, and that I'd hardly be able to tell the difference between it and 120 or 240hz TVs....I was wrong.

This goes to show that Amazon always has the lowest prices and I never hesitate when it comes to making purchases from them.  Picture quality is excellent, the menu is very easy to use, and enough hook ups for everything you may want to plug in. About a week after I purchased this the price was lowered on Amazon and after contacting customer service they refunded me for TWICE the difference! There was a hiccup when it came to the scheduled delivery, but it was a mistake by the shipper and they quickly resolved that issue as well.  I would most definitely recommend this product to friends, I can't find anything negative about it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV and Spectacular Customer Service from LG!
Reviews.Author: catippins
Reviews.Content: 12/03/2010:  Initial review - other updates to follow below:Ordered and received this TV and:1.  Dead pixels in two areas of the screen.2.  The upper right portion of the screen is brighter than the rest of the screen.3.  In spite of the plastic stripping that surrounds the frame, this TV had a scratch mark on the right hand side.Amazon is shipping me a new TV and when that one arrives I'll update this review.12/13/2010:  Update:  replacement from Amazon arrived:Got the replacement in short order from Amazon.  They handled the replacement in no time, sent one out without charging me for the replacement (the old one goes back tomorrow) and I have to say I love this TV.The quality of the picture is superb.At 1080p and 100,000 to 1 contrast ratio it's beautiful.Setup is a snap, but it takes a while to search all the cable channels.  Which brings up a point - make sure your cable box or feed is hooked up before you turn it on (but yes, you can rescan later if you wish).I also have an LG BD590 Blu Ray and both of these together are a winning combo.I paid 478.00 for this TV when I bought it.  I see the price fluctuates although that may be seasonal.  I've seen it priced up to $600.00 since I bought it.It's a steal.  I went up to Best Buy and looked at other 42 inch TV's and could not compare this side by side with other units, but my perception is that the picture on this TV easily compares to units selling for much more.Blacks are blacks without any lousy looking grays and I've not adjusted contrast or brightness at all.I'm a Comcast subscriber and the HD channels that feed from them to this TV are nothing short of breathtaking.I mounted this on the stand and it's a simple 8 screws.  The stand is sturdy like a rock.Some additional notes that involve an LG BD590 Blu Ray player and this TV:I also stream Netflix directly from the Internet from the LG BD590.  Incredible.This TV has a built in USB port so if you wanted to add an external drive to play your own movies you can.  I have tested this functionality on the BD590 (but not the TV directly) and it works extremely well (including .mkv files).  Important note:  I've had a couple of .avi's that wouldn't play due to improper audio format or the codec used in the .avi.  I suspect this problem may present with the TV as well, but these have been few and far between.  I'm thrilled to be able to play .mkv's and .avi's without having to burn them to DVD anymore.  This alone is incredible.  I love it.  I love it. I love it.Note:  Check out the AVS forum site (google "avs forum") and you will get the most detailed info on both the TV and the Blu Ray player.I don't see how you can go wrong with this TV, but just make sure you buy it from someone like Amazon who will take it back if there is something wrong with it like there was with my initial purchase.  You don't want to get stuck having to ship it back to someone who will double charge you or get the old back before they ship out the new one and be without a TV.  This is why I love buying from Amazon - no problems EVER on returns and the Amazon folks are always great to work with.In summary, this is a spectacular TV and the price can't be beat.08/31/2012:  Update after owning this TV for about a year and 9 months:Well, my TV died last week.  It just wouldn't power up beyond the power LED displaying a red glow.  Called LG.  Tried a reset.  No good.  I was disappointed that less than 2 years into owning this, the TV was history.  I wound up talking to an LG supervisor and guess what - they agreed to extend my warranty to cover the cost of a repair.  How great is that?  They had no obligation to do this and I've got to say that extra mile that customer service went was spectacular.  It's nice to know they are willing to do this sort of thing.  Kudos to LG for stepping up to the plate.I guess the moral of the story is it pays sometimes to ask for help - the fine folks at LG (thank you JB!) sure helped me have a good day by saving me the cost of buying a new TV or paying for an expensive repair.
